ch0113_00_mikan/0101_0701_01_10:
I’m pleased that we were able to meet
up, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0113_00_mikan/0101_0701_02_10:
Um... If you happen to have some time, would you
mind chatting with me for a bit?
ch0113_00_mikan/0601_0701_01_10:
It seems that even on Pasio, there are people
trying to do bad things...
ch0113_00_mikan/0601_0701_02_10: and the ones that suffer are their Pokémon.
ch0113_00_mikan/0601_0701_03_10:
We’ve got to do our best to protect
those Pokémon.
ch0113_00_mikan/0601_0702_01_10:
If you hear about any suffering Pokémon, please
be sure to tell me.
ch0113_00_mikan/0601_0702_02_10: I want to help them in whatever way I can.
ch0113_00_mikan/0602_0701_01_10:
Olivine City in Johto sits along the coast of a
beautiful ocean.
ch0113_00_mikan/0602_0701_02_10:
I think that’s why I enjoy being by the ocean
so much.
ch0113_00_mikan/0602_0701_03_10: It makes me feel connected to home...
ch0113_00_mikan/0602_0702_01_10:
Even across the ocean, I feel comfortable so long
as I’m around Pokémon I can also find in Johto.
ch0113_00_mikan/0602_0702_02_10:
I think it’s because they make me feel like I’m
still at home.
ch0113_00_mikan/0603_0701_01_10: Have you had the chance to meet Erika yet?
ch0113_00_mikan/0603_0701_02_10: I really admire and respect her.
ch0113_00_mikan/0603_0701_03_10: Sometimes I go to her when I need advice.
ch0113_00_mikan/0603_0701_04_10:
She’s such a wonderful person that, well...
I actually get a bit nervous around her.
ch0113_00_mikan/0603_0702_01_10: Um... If you happen to see Erika...
ch0113_00_mikan/0603_0702_02_10:
telling her that I admire her and think she’s
wonderful would be, um, very embarrassing...
So, um...
ch0113_00_mikan/0604_0701_01_10:
Steelix’s hard, tough body is incredible, don’t
you think?
ch0113_00_mikan/0604_0701_02_10: There’s hardly anything that can scratch her.
ch0113_00_mikan/0604_0701_03_10:
It’d be great if I could become that strong
one day...
ch0113_00_mikan/0604_0702_01_10:
Being kind and considerate toward people and
Pokémon—that’s what it means to have a strong
heart, I think.
ch0113_00_mikan/0604_0702_02_10:
Even on Pasio, there are so many people and
Pokémon to meet.
ch0113_00_mikan/0604_0702_03_10: I want to make my heart stronger, little by little.
ch0113_00_mikan/0605_0701_01_10:
Er...um...Pasio’s a lovely place. Don’t you think
so, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0113_00_mikan/0605_0701_02_10:
All over the island, all kinds of people and
Pokémon are happily spending time together...
ch0113_00_mikan/0605_0701_03_10:
It makes me happy to see sync pairs having so
much fun.
ch0113_00_mikan/0605_0701_04_10:
I feel much stronger than usual when I’m with
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0113_00_mikan/0605_0701_05_10: Um...I hope we can continue to be friends.
ch0113_00_mikan/0605_0702_01_10:
This...might be a weird thing for me to say to
you, but...
ch0113_00_mikan/0605_0702_02_10:
When I look at you and your partner Pokémon,
I can feel courage building up inside me.
ch0113_00_mikan/1701_0701_01_10: Um... Do you have a moment to spare?
ch0113_00_mikan/1701_0701_02_10:
I wanted to give you this. Please don’t feel bad
about using it.
ch0113_00_mikan/1701_0702_01_10:
I’ll always support you, so...please do your
best, OK?
ch0113_00_mikan/2501_0701_01_10:
Er...um...Steel-type Pokémon are really
wonderful, don’t you think?
ch0113_00_mikan/2501_0701_02_10:
They’re... You know... Clang! And they’re really
sharp, too.
ch0113_00_mikan/2501_0701_03_10:
Whenever I look at them, I feel like something
takes hold of me.
ch0113_00_mikan/2501_0701_04_10:
Steel-type Pokémon are just so charming. I could
talk about them for hours.
ch0113_00_mikan/2501_0702_01_10: Um... Sorry for saying something so weird.
ch0113_00_mikan/2501_0702_02_10:
When I talk about Steel-type Pokémon, I get so
passionate that I forget where I am.
ch0113_00_mikan/2501_0702_03_10:
Um...please don’t look at me so much. It’s kind
of embarrassing.
ch0113_00_mikan/2511_0701_01_10: Um, excuse me... Are you hungry?
ch0113_00_mikan/2511_0701_02_10:
If it’s all right with you, would you like to
eat together?
ch0113_00_mikan/2511_0701_03_10: I usually prefer to eat by myself.
ch0113_00_mikan/2511_0701_04_10:
But every now and then, I like to have company
while I enjoy a meal.
ch0113_00_mikan/2511_0702_01_10:
Um... Just how hungry are
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0113_00_mikan/2511_0702_02_10:
What I mean is, if you’re really, really hungry,
we should go to a restaurant where you can eat
a lot.
ch0113_00_mikan/3001_0701_01_10:
I woke up so refreshed this morning! I wonder
if all the tough battling I did yesterday had
anything to do with it.
ch0113_00_mikan/3002_0701_01_10:
Sometimes when I accidentally brush up against
my Pokémon in the morning, her steel is so cold
that it wakes me right up!
ch0113_00_mikan/3003_0701_01_10:
Soaking up some bright, warm sunshine always
puts my heart at ease.
ch0113_00_mikan/3004_0701_01_10:
I always keep a close eye on my Pokémon’s
health and well-being. I’d be so upset if she
got hurt or sick.
ch0113_00_mikan/3005_0701_01_10:
They say that letting your Pokémon get lots of
sleep helps them grow faster. Sounds like a good
idea, don’t you think?
ch0113_00_mikan/3006_0701_01_10:
I think it’s really important for Trainers and
Pokémon to join together...with one heart and
one mind.
